title: Peer Feedback Utilization Strategies for Online Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in project-based learning and competency in using basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Establishment of an online collaborative environment for analyzing social issues and deriving solutions.

learning_goals: Learners can provide at least three specific improvement suggestions during the project development process through peer feedback.
Learners can provide qualitative feedback on project deliverables within 48 hours using online collaboration tools.
Learners can identify and question at least two logical errors found in peers' projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
